bibl.seg: Cotton Hannah M. and Joseph Geiger, Masada II. The Yigael Yadin Excavations 1963-1965. Final Reports. The Latin and Greek Documents. With a Contribution by David J. Thomas. (The Masada Reports.)
Jerusalem, Israel Exploration Society - The Hebrew University of Jerusalem, 1989, 4°, x-246 pp. et 48 pll.
Nos 721-749. Papyri [P. Masada]. - 750-794. Ostraca [O. Masada]. - 795-927. Tituli picti. - 928-945. Graffiti. - 946-951. Latin Amphora Stamps.
C.R. par André Laronde, REL 68 (1990) p. 254. - Alain Martin, Latomus 51 (1992) pp. 197-198. - Günter Poethke, ArchPF 41 (1995) pp. 87-90. - Margaret M. Roxan, CR N.S., 41 (1991) pp 458-459.
